definitions.definition: The result of mixing two or more substances; a mixture .
examples: Now add the raisins to the mix .

definitions.definition: The result of combining items normally kept separate.
examples: My recipe file was now a mix of meat and dairy.
The combination of classical music and hip hop is a surprisingly good mix .

definitions.definition: A preparation, usually in the form of a powder, into which other ingredients can be mixed to prepare a specified foodstuff.
examples: Cake mix . Pancake mix . Hot chocolate mix .

definitions.definition: The result of mixing several tracks.
The finished version of a recording.
examples: I've almost finished the mix for this song.

definitions.definition: A substance used to dilute or adulterate an illicit drug .

main_definition: The result of mixing two or more substances; a mixture .
secondary_definitions: The result of combining items normally kept separate.
A preparation, usually in the form of a powder, into which other ingredients can be mixed to prepare a specified foodstuff.
( music ) The result of mixing several tracks.
( music ) The finished version of a recording.
( US , slang , uncountable ) A substance used to dilute or adulterate an illicit drug .
